title: RE60019: Failure Data Organization %26 Analysis - Quick Facts

Offered by | Reliability Engineering Centre

Previous Year Grade Distribution

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Organization and management of reliability data. Data Banks and Data storage and retrieval system. Statistical concepts probability distributions, methods for single sample (Maximum likelihood estimation, goodness of fit, etc.), regression models for data, proportional hazards modeling, Bayesian approach, multivariate models, repairable systems, model for system reliability.
